website_summaries.verdict: Choose this B12 supplement if you need one that is very easy to take, and you don't need an extremely potent formula.
pros: A unique way to get your B12, as it comes in a tasty spray formula that's made of organic ingredients
cons: Not as strong as other B12 supplements on our list, as it only contains 500 mcg per dose
May get stale if not stored in a cool place
A few reports of nozzles that break

customer_reviews.title: This brand is now owned by Nestle.
customer_reviews.text: Half way through it started to get really moldy on the spray cap and the taste started to get funky and weird. I always kept it in the refrigerator but still it got moldy. Had to trash it half way through. Also, FYI Garden of Life was bought by Nestle.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Your “new” plastic bottles are affecting your product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for a while and I am VERY happy with the product and it’s affects for my health. However, the reason for the review and its 3 stars....the switch from glass to plastic bottles. Not only does it affect the taste but it bothers me to the point of I may switch products! Why cheap out and use plastic. Glass is just, if not more recycle friendly and can be repurpose easily. I’m disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Schoeffler

customer_reviews.title: Yucky mold
customer_reviews.text: Really liked this b12 until I noticed I had mold all beneath the pump. Absolutely disgusting.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed! I also buy Vit C and D3 in ...
customer_reviews.text: They changed from glass to plastic. Very disappointed! I also buy Vit C and D3 in spray which are still in glass. At least the ones I just bought. However, the vit B12 bottle in spray, that I've been buying for a while, was plastic this time. The plastic bottle is smaller but it is still the same amount 2 oz. There is a "6" on the bottom. Not sure what that means but If this is the code for plastics "6" is one of the most toxic kind of plastic there is. I won't be buying again unless they change back to glass.
customer_reviews.author: Blanca T

customer_reviews.title: Spoilt
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a couple of weeks ago and it has this weird black material stuck around the spray and tastes weird(like an expired material) I have had this ordered a couple of times, so the taste is something different
customer_reviews.author: Kiran

customer_reviews.title: Good Taste Lots of Energy
customer_reviews.text: Store in the fridge or it will get moldy. Otherwise a great product! Will be purchasing again in the future! Tastes good too! It was the perfect morning boost for someone who doesn't have any caffeine in their diet and chooses to go natural!
customer_reviews.author: Keisha

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend. Shipping was fast and well packaged
customer_reviews.text: I have been using tablets for years with sketchy results. After researching liquid VS tablet I thought I would give it a try. I suffer from Hashimoto's, and my husband had thyroid cancer, From taking 5-6 10 mg tablets at a time with little results to two sprays a day, the results are dramatic. we can finally tell it is working for us. Highly recommend. Shipping was fast and well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: J, Ru

customer_reviews.title: Sketchy
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this product daily several months. I started developing weird episodes of anxiety, chest tightness, and digestive issues at night (when I take my vitamins) and only recently connected the dots. I forgot to take my vitamins the previous night and felt great all day. Then tonight within 20 minutes of taking my vitamins the extreme anxiety and chest tightness came back! This paired with the reports of mold by other customers tells me this product is not fit consumption.
customer_reviews.author: Bo Darko

customer_reviews.title: Beware of what you buy
customer_reviews.text: The product has mold growing inside the top outside the top the inside of it would not be buying his again please check your product when you buy it
customer_reviews.author: Mizz Watkins

customer_reviews.title: GETS MOLDY QUICK - WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.text: My bottle molded on the inside and outside when I was about half way through the bottle. I did not have it for very long and kept it in a cool, dry place as recommended. I am super disappointed because I love the ingredients of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: I like the spray is very nice too
customer_reviews.text: Have been vegan for at least 10 years so Vitamin B12 supplement imperative. I can vouch for this particular brand backed up by lab work. Have not run low since taking this every day. I like the spray is very nice too. Will not switch brands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Vegan & Toddler Approved.
customer_reviews.text: There's not much to say about a B12 spray. Other than, this one is great. This has been my go-to B12 for quite a while now. I have a young toddler and this is a simple way to ensure that she gets her required intake of vitamin b12. She enjoys the flavor and never once have I had an issue with her taking this. That alone has made this my favorite b12! I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MelissaTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Hmm
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a while. My one concern is that when it sits for a day or two it seems to either crystalize or grow some kind of spores around the spray hole. I also have the vitamin D and it doesn't seem to have the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Energy through the roof
customer_reviews.text: 5 years ago, I had surgery to remove a pituitary tumor. I lost all energy. Because I was taking so many pills, I needed something sublingual. I purchased this out of curiosity. So glad I did. Honestly, this is one of the best b-12 products I've tried. The flavor is good. It's sweet though. I usually spray this about 5 minutes before brushing my teeth in the morning. If not, the sweet flavor will stay with you. My energy is through the roof. I can def tell if I miss a dose. As far as the other reviews about mold, I wash the nozzle once a week to prevent it. Ive had no over issues.
customer_reviews.author: Aunt Ray

customer_reviews.title: Love this B12!
customer_reviews.text: My family is vegan so it's important we take a B vitamin that is easily processed, vegan, and affordable. We love this spray. There was a period of about 1-2 months where I wasn't taking this spray and i noticed a huge changed. Oddly, my skin broke out with pimples and bumpy "chicken skin", I was exhausted, and I caught 2 colds (which is not typical). After 1 week of taking this everyday, my skin and energy level is back to normal AND the cold is gone!! Never doing that again.
customer_reviews.author: rosewilhelm

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS - IT WILL MOLD
customer_reviews.text: Should have listened to the other reviews - the product spray is badly designed and will mold and less of a month of use - too late to return it for a refund not.
customer_reviews.author: Real Deal

customer_reviews.title: Officially My Favorite Vitamin
customer_reviews.text: B12 only has a one-third absorption rate. This means for every one dose, you only get a third of what you are actually taking absorbed into your body. For this product, 1 spray is equal to 500mcg. So based on absorption rate, I'm only receiving about 167mcg per spray. But guess what? This stuff is so incredibly tasty and easy to administer, that I just triple or quadruple my dosage. No need for water (of course B12 is fat-soluable so it should be taken with food), no feelings of choking on pills, and it comes with the added satisfaction of knowing this product's B12 source is whole organic food. How amazing is this.
customer_reviews.author: J. M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product. Great Flavor.
customer_reviews.text: I don't really know what more needs to be said about this B12 spray other than it's really easy to use and the flavor isn't bad at all; it tastes like mixed berry. I had been taking some B12 pills for months but wanted to try something new. I plan on using this brand from here on out because the spray is much easier to take :)
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: The after taste
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it is effective and I won't know that until I get my next blood test. But what I can say is that for a second this stuff tastes good until the after taste kicks in and it tastes like sucking on a Tylenol. Not one of those for kids, but those white ones that you are supposed to swallow!
customer_reviews.author: Madeline

customer_reviews.title: Perfect choice!
customer_reviews.text: I am so excited that I found this product! My doctor advised me to take a B-12 supplement and I instantly took to the internet to find what kind was best. Liquid, methyl, and certified vegan were the top suggestions. This one covered all of my requirements so I took the plunge despite HATING liquid medicines and vitamins. I'm glad I did because this one tastes GREAT and I instantly felt better, more awake and re-energized!! I'm a vegetarian and had been feeling a little sluggish. This supplement is exactly what I needed. Adding it to my subscription purchases next month :)
customer_reviews.author: np4gp

customer_reviews.title: Best B12 Vitamin ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best B12 vitamin I’ve ever tried, this is the second time I buy it and keeps working for me as day one! I used to feel tired all the time and thank God I found this. It gives a lot of energy and keeps you active the whole day! I fully recommend this... and it’s Vegan! Remember to keep it refrigerated once opened.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Carter

customer_reviews.title: I use daily
customer_reviews.text: I particularly like this brand of everything. I use the daily vitamin in a pill form and the vitamin d.
customer_reviews.author: Violetwrites Leftow

customer_reviews.title: Yuk! They changed the flavor - tastes like kid's cough syrup, only stronger
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying this vitamin B-12 for years, and loved how easy it was to use, and it's very mild raspberry flavor. This latest bottle tastes so disgusting, I cringe every time I use it. It's super strong and syrupy tasting, like a kid's medicine, as if all the flavor settled to the bottom of the vat and that's what went into this bottle. I'm looking for an alternative, and will probably throw this out.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mason

customer_reviews.title: Instant Energy!
customer_reviews.text: Works so well! I've used other b vitamin supplements and this is the best by far. I've tried sub-lingual and gummies but this has a much quicker and more noticeable effect. The taste takes some getting used to, very fruity and almost too sweet, kinda like 5 hour energy (if you've ever tried those) but definitely not intolerable and I'm already used to it. I'll be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Chemical taste
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this item 4 times through Amazon. I just opened my most recent bottle purchased a little over a month ago and the liquid has a strong chemical taste and burns my mouth. It does not taste the same as the previous bottles. Unfortunately there is no way to return the product and the link to get support from the manufacturer doesn't work. I will not be buying this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gave me acne
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited for this but it made me break out horribly for weeks. I have taken accutane so my skin is always perfectly clear no matter what I do to it. Just one squirt of this and my skin goes haywire and it takes weeks to get it back to normal. If you do research there have been studies that prove that high doses of b12 affects the bacteria on your skin. I’m going to look for a lower dose b12 and hopefully have better luck with that.
customer_reviews.author: Darla

customer_reviews.title: Very leaky spray mechanism
customer_reviews.text: The sprayers on this bottle are terrible, they leak nonstop and make a mess every time we use them. I complained about the first one and got a replacement that’s just as bad.
customer_reviews.author: pushkin85

customer_reviews.title: Great energy boost
customer_reviews.text: Flavor is cherry and has no residue taste, unless you don’t shake it before spraying. Effective for a daily energy boost if you can’t get B12 shots. I spray two pumps in my mouth every morning and one in the afternoon if I feel sluggish. Since B vitamins are water soluble, I have noticed that if I don’t drink a lot of water during the day, I have experienced leg cramps at night.
customer_reviews.author: Sissy

customer_reviews.title: New formula with Stevia tastes bad!!!
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for a long time and loved it and loved the taste. Now they added Stevia for no reason and it tastes gross. All I can taste is the Stevia and it’s not a pleasant taste. I’m disappointed that such a great product has been ruined by a sugar substitute that isn’t even needed. There was zero sugar or sugar substitute before and it doesn’t need any. It tasted natural before. I am returning it and finding another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: I love it and so will you!
customer_reviews.text: I can tell the difference when I use this. I definitely have more energy and I’m hoping it’ll keep my canker sore away. The flavor isn’t unbearable. My first spray I wasn’t sure if I could continue to handle the flavor; but after a few spray it’s fine now. I don’t mind it at all and it could be worst I guess. It’s a great alternative to vitamin pills or gummy.
customer_reviews.author: YL

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I keep mine in the refrigerator. Haven’t seen any mold or issues that other were reporting. I’ve had it for 2 months so far.
customer_reviews.author: R Law

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff but store it in frig. Hate to see a great products get bad reviews due to consumer error. I don't need to be warned coffee is hot when purchased. I didn't need to be told to refrigerate this.
customer_reviews.author: robin

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be more natural
customer_reviews.text: A lot of sugar in this product along with red dye. We are trying to be more natural with the vitamins we give to our children. If you dont mind these issues then it's a good product.
customer_reviews.author: M. Denton

customer_reviews.title: The latest review 2016
customer_reviews.text: In need of vitamin b12 this was my choice. This is a brand I trust. Seeing as all the reviews where a year or older I said hey maybe they fixed some stuff..NOPE! note: I will update if I see mold!! But I bought two of these sprays and both where covered! One more than the other. Obviously this is due to poor making of the product and I do hope they fix this! I am storing these in the fridge and am rinsing and drying the top of the spray nozzle after every use. Other than the poor packaging I feel great already after taking this. Taste is good too.
customer_reviews.author: Musicman

customer_reviews.title: Sell out.
customer_reviews.text: I had previously loved this product, but Garden of life sold out to Nestle. NESTLE Is a company lacking in morals and I would suggest everyone switching companies.
customer_reviews.author: stormy

customer_reviews.title: Really Glad I Added B12
customer_reviews.text: Within a few days of adding Garden of Life B12 to my daily supplement regimen, I noticed an increase in my energy. It was a natural increase, not like the nervous boost that comes from energy drinks. It doesn’t keep me up at night but I have enough energy to get through dinner and clean-up. That wasn’t always the case.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Wilson

customer_reviews.title: One of the best quality brands on market and works great!
customer_reviews.text: My family is vegetarian so making sure we get enough nutrients is very important to me. I researched this brand product and found the quality to be best on market. The taste is pleasant. My husband and I notice our energy is increased when we take it. I’d definitely recommend and will be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Flecia

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Been taking it for years. I prefer the spray method to a pill melting under my tongue. Also make sure you get this methylcobalamin version, absorbs best.
customer_reviews.author: gogohusky

customer_reviews.title: This is great and has really helped me
customer_reviews.text: This is great and has really helped me. Does what is says and I started using it after a blood test revealed that I was lacking B 12. Since I eat plenty of food containing B12 it was safe to assume that I was not able to absorb it from the food and therefore opted for this instead of pills. I also started taking daily home made Kefir, to re-establish my gut flora as there has to be a reason, why I cannot absorb the B 12 from natural food sources.
customer_reviews.author: Caprilli

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Buying another! I am definitely noticing a positive effect on my energy level shortly after a spray. So it's worth it just for that extra push to get me to either start the day or keep the day going. I also keep mine refrigerated and clean the spray pump and cap each weekend. The taste is great to me, keeping it cold may be helping that. Better than getting a needle shot at the doctors office and definitely more noticeable (to me) than the pill or chew-able supplements.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This sits on my desk and I remember to use it!
customer_reviews.text: I was diagnosed with B12 deficiency. Given fancy horse pills that cost a fortune and were nasty to take. Use this instead. Pleasant, easy to take and my B12 numbers at the docs are above normal.
customer_reviews.author: zephyr 2

customer_reviews.title: Kids approved!
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand as you can see I have a few I take daily. My kids especially love the spray they love the taste! I’ve been using this brand for over year and never looked back. I especially love the sprays it’s easy to use and surprisingly refreshing. I keep the spray in the fridge to keep it fresh and it’s on the package on the directions. I read on other reviews they experienced mold on the sprays. I recommend store it in the fridge I’ve never had an issue with mold with any of the vitamin sprays.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Packs a kick. Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter requires specific B vitamins due to some unusual anatomy. Getting her to take vitamins is normally a pain. This worked. Of course, I tried it as well. Huge difference in energy, twice as good as caffeine IMO. Easy to use, not a horrible taste, and my daughter definitely approves. Good stuff all around.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Very Convenient
customer_reviews.text: This vegan B12 spray is very convenient to take and actually tastes pretty good. In fact, I have to put it up where my kids can't get it because they like the taste so much. Has it cured all that ails me? No. In fact, I haven't really noticed any difference at all, but I trust that it is keeping my B12 levels good and that's all I really wanted. I take it daily and give my kids one or two sprays a week.
customer_reviews.author: In My Opinion

customer_reviews.title: This product changed my life for the better
customer_reviews.text: A friend bought this for me because I have a variety of medical conditions that cause insomnia, low energy, and fatigue. Since I started taking this, I've been sleeping much better, and my energy level is way back up! I can't say enough about this product. And I don't know why people are having trouble with the bottle; it's working just fine for me at nearly 4 weeks in!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly B Haut

customer_reviews.title: B12 Vitamin  for Metabolism and Energy
customer_reviews.text: I need My Vit-B12 Every day It gets me going..... it's Organic love the favor
customer_reviews.author: Alberto C.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend great stuff
customer_reviews.text: You would be surprised on how tasty this is it does not taste like medicine it’s almost dangerous it’s like a juice I recommend you only squirt the product once in your mouth Highly recommend great stuff
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for about a year. The spray seems to work better than the sublingual tabs for me. I am recovering from a back injury and can't get out to the stores so was very happy to find this on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Patscats

customer_reviews.title: Great taste great price
customer_reviews.text: My kids and I rarely eat meat so a b12 supplement is imperative. My kids don’t complain and like the taste. I haven’t noticed any changes in energy, but it may be because I already have a lot of energy. I trust this brand and like the price.
customer_reviews.author: lena

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting quality
customer_reviews.text: This product is great one spritz and you’re good to go! Tastes great and bonus is that it’s got the healthy benefits to boot!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tastes fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Tastes fantastic and you only need to take one spray daily.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana

customer_reviews.title: Great quality until 3/4 empty
customer_reviews.text: This is a great B12 spray. My only complaint is that the taste changes after two months and I wish the bottle was glass. I think the added flavor settles so make sure to shake up the bottle before using.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Sena

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Great
customer_reviews.text: Much more pleasant than taking another pill every morning. One bottle lasts me several months doing 1 spray per day. This is the second bottle I’ve had and I’ll continue to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Rhiannon Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Lousy
customer_reviews.text: The spray cap got black mold after only a few weeks. I won’t order this again. And it’s so sweet that it tastes bad.
customer_reviews.author: AnnMarie Chionchio

customer_reviews.title: best b12on the market
customer_reviews.text: I spent a few hours doing research on which brands to buy and my opinion this one the best on the market base on reviews and professional opinions.
customer_reviews.author: Anna G.

customer_reviews.title: Good taste, easy to take
customer_reviews.text: I give this product 5 stars , I was taking vitamin b12 in pills and terrible idea , my doctor recommended this product and I love it! Taste really good!, you have to keep it in the fridge after open it and it’s even better because it feels fresh when you spray it in your mouth
customer_reviews.author: Anny cancino

customer_reviews.title: Ick
customer_reviews.text: I had used a bottle of a different brand & thought I'd try something cheaper. Gross! Will stick with the more expensive brand I had originally started with
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best B12 outside of a shot
customer_reviews.text: My ride or die B12 product as long-term vegan. I love it when I'm in-between B12 shots
customer_reviews.author: Taysnew

customer_reviews.title: Keep Refrigerated !
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for about a year. It tastes great and I like it a lot better than other B12 pill supplements I’ve tried. I signed up for the subscription every three months and love it. I do wish it wasn’t in a plastic bottle, but overall it’s a great product !
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Taste great
customer_reviews.text: Felt better within 3 / 4 days of using it.
customer_reviews.author: BellasMommy0717

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor & better than pills or Meltaways
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. The Raspberry flavor is really good. I can use it quickly being in spray form. Its Organic made by a really good company. It has 140 servings! Which is well worth the $10-11... Its Vegan but Almost all B12 vitamin supplements are( Watch for gelatin and other additives) . But even knowing that most are vegan, I still really like this one and would Def purchase it again.. Because with this one I don't have to worry about the source, additives, added sugar, nasty preservatives or added colors. Its great Check it out!
customer_reviews.author: Chasity Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Will wake you up without coffee
customer_reviews.text: This product gives you serious energy. I work as a teacher in an elementary school. ( I need energy ALL day). I use to drink a large cup of. coffee every morning, but now I use B 12, and this Vitamin gives you Great energy all day, with no side effects. If you don’t want to drink coffee, or ever start this is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Excellent

customer_reviews.title: EDIT: now owned by Nestle! :(((
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this brand for years but it can no longer be trusted unfortunately, as Nestle acquired it! This is very sad, It reminds me of Colgate buying Tom's and then putting their stupid fluoride everywhere while keeping the same packaging so you wouldn't think of re-reading the ingredients to realize they have changed... Any suggestion of alternatives? What would be an independent company that makes supplements from truly raw (real food) ingredients?
customer_reviews.author: FLO

customer_reviews.title: Packaged in a plastic bottle - no thanks
customer_reviews.text: I've used this spray for some time and like it, but the fact that it's in a plastic bottle in concerning. I've switched to a vegan brand that packages in glass.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie Dubois

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Love it, have more energy and my blood pressure is regulated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work anymore.
customer_reviews.text: They claim 'Vegan Methylcobalamin' but there's no way. I remember using this stuff a few years back and it worked great! They must have drastically changed the ingredients after Nestle bought them out. No surprise there.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Favorite B-12 Spray!
customer_reviews.text: I love the flavor & ease of use! Simplest Vegan way to maintain B-12!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Finally!!! A vitamin B12 that's works for me!
customer_reviews.text: Before I found this vitamin B12 product I was about to give up on finding a vitamin B12 that my body and system could tolerate it's very tasty and in spray form so it's very easy to take and it does work I am very grateful for this product thankyou
customer_reviews.author: J.A.

customer_reviews.title: Great taste!!
customer_reviews.text: Has a good taste. Easy to swallow. Gets into the system quicker being a liquid. It works for me!
customer_reviews.author: muitobem

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Great
customer_reviews.text: Before buying I did a lot of research and this one seemed to have the best reviews - as long as it was kept in the fridge. Thats where I keep it and I am surprised at how good the spray tastes!
customer_reviews.author: Diane W.

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great, non-gmo, organic = perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Has a nice natural raspberry flavor. Purchased as a supplement for a vegan diet. Maybe it is my imagination, but I feel like it really does give me more energy as well. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A

customer_reviews.title: So easy to take, tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and the price here is great. Garden of Life makes quality products, Love that it's vegan and tastes amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley Fox

customer_reviews.title: Will keep buying
customer_reviews.text: YUMMY!!! So good we love it. You get a lot of sprays too. It taste shockingly phenomenal! Sweet and great ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Good for Vegans.
customer_reviews.text: I am a plant based vegan so I need to supplement. I like this a lot. The only reason I gave 4 stars is because Garden of Life, which has been my favorite for a long time, puts heavy metals into their raw meal protein. Broke my heart. Once this is gone, I will never purchase from them again.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonianRay

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY. MOLD
customer_reviews.text: AWFUL, GROSS, REPULSIVE. Mold grows with a few days/weeks of use. Save yourself the money, DON'T BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Ambrocio Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Help
customer_reviews.text: My husband is very low in B-12 he tried this product that I got him. It didn't help him at all. Infact it made his symptoms worse so he had to go back to taking his normal B-12 pills.
customer_reviews.author: syd

customer_reviews.title: Great product sans mold problem
customer_reviews.text: I love this product but it grows mold on the surface of the liquid fairly quickly and you may be spraying it in your mouth unknowingly.
customer_reviews.author: MarqeeMark

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is effective (my blood test showed my B12 ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is effective (my blood test showed my B12 levels were completely normal) and it tastes frickin delicious! I actually look forward to taking this supplement!
customer_reviews.author: zeltite

customer_reviews.title: My toddler loves the taste.
customer_reviews.text: Great flavor and easy to use.love that it’s vegan while plant ingredients, especially for B12!
customer_reviews.author: stacie

customer_reviews.title: I would repurchase over and over.
customer_reviews.text: Easy one spray a day for everyone in family, tastes good, I would keep refrigerated though!
customer_reviews.author: Marisa Pereyra

customer_reviews.title: Works for me.
customer_reviews.text: I get a boost of energy from it so it works for me. I take only 1 squirt a day as it says. Nothing major, just gets rid of the fatigue feeling I get some days from being tired cuz moms do a lot and get worn down.
customer_reviews.author: Vy

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor.  Good energy.  No crash
customer_reviews.text: I spray this under my tongue. It definitely ups my energy. It's no 5 hr energy, and it dies help me wakeup And focus. It tastes incredibly. I also use it to curb my cravings to eat too early in the day.
customer_reviews.author: Francis Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great price and value seems to work!
customer_reviews.text: Great taste, I keep mine in the refrigerator to keep it cool, lasts for ever. Not sure if it gives me energy but I have noticed I lost weight not sure if it's a coincidence or not? Over all im happy with it and will continue to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Zyia.Active.Jayme

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Great, and Works Just As Well!
customer_reviews.text: Such an easy way to get B-12 into your daily routine. I purchased this product primarily to speed up recovery after my workouts, and let me tell you....It works wonders - I walk out of the gym feeling like a sore rubber band, and 20-30 minutes after spraying 1-2 sprays into my mouth, I'm feeling much more normal. It tastes great, and much easier to take than a pill; which is much more of a chore to me, than a quick spray as I'm headed out of the house in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: MissMinx421

customer_reviews.title: Needs a better packaging/shipping method.
customer_reviews.text: Upon arrival, some of the contents of the bottle had leaked out. The plastic wrapped was covered in red liquid.
customer_reviews.author: Northern Timber

customer_reviews.title: An alternative to caffeine
customer_reviews.text: Vitamin b12 is a very important vitamin our bodies need and is absorbed in the terminal illeum region. It is found in some foods and meats, and many of the population is deficient in this essential vitamin. I always pair it with vitamin d3 5000iu It tastes great I spray a few everyday usually and keep it refrigerated. It gives me that necessary bump To avoid caffeine also. Win win.
customer_reviews.author: Aminoh

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste, Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: This B12 spray tastes great and is easy to use. It is 140 servings which will last 4-5 months so it is a good price for what you are getting. I love that it is vegan and organic too!
customer_reviews.author: Shaina

customer_reviews.title: Mom wants some!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great product. A terrific value for your money. It’s loaded with straight up goodness. My mom asked me to get her a bottle that’s how good it is.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Herrala

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I love all the My Kind vitamins in this line that I'e purchased. The B 12 is probably my fave as it's a spray. I can't handle pills too well....too big to swallow so the spray works. I'm a customer for life!!
customer_reviews.author: Renee S.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Used for a month, nothing happened to my b12 level. Just a bottle of sugar water
customer_reviews.author: Wei

customer_reviews.title: Seems fine.
customer_reviews.text: This is the same product available in Whole Foods but for less. Warning...for me and some others, Vitamin B-12 can be stimulating so I dont recommend taking it in the pm hours. I like this company because they get their vitamins from natural foods.
customer_reviews.author: Bob B.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have used this produce off & on for awhile. I am a vegetarian and if I did not have to eat, I wouldn't, its just something I get pleasure out of, so this product helps me.
customer_reviews.author: Chowsrus

customer_reviews.title: I like the taste of this so much that I'm tempted ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the taste of this so much that I'm tempted to go in for a second spray each time I use it; it mostly tastes like a berry popsicle to me. I love that it's vegan, organic, and it's the methylcobalamin form of B12. I store mine in the fridge and haven't had any issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: Rina

customer_reviews.title: Won't buy again
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work as well as the supplement I was taking before. I have to rinse the bottle & cap before AND after every use, because it leaks terribly.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda McDevitt

customer_reviews.title: Great product from a superior brand!
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my second container. Flavor is great, and the spray quantity lasts a long time. I love Garden of Life brand and use several of their supplement products. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Antonia

customer_reviews.title: Bottle dribbles
customer_reviews.text: The spray bottle does not function well. It dribbles onto the bottle when used. I can say I feel a surge of energy on some days when I can get the product into my mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Davette C.

customer_reviews.title: For energy and brain function
customer_reviews.text: This entire brand is incredible. As far as B-12 goes, this one is my favorite. Tastes good, very easy to use. Just a couple sprays and that’s it! Great product and very inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Candice crawford

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Like the taste and it works. I am vegan and I was having metallic taste in my mouth... some deficiency of B-12... this helps a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Lizardo

customer_reviews.title: Must have item for health conscious vegans!
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great. Lasts forever. Affordable. Good quality, organic supplements are hard to find but Alicia Silverstone knows what she’s doing.
customer_reviews.author: ADW

customer_reviews.title: Varying taste
customer_reviews.text: My family consuming this product for more than a year, in recent lot we are feeing taste change in different bottles bought at different time. A strong taste which is totally awkward
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Garden of Life B12 Vitamin - mykind Organic Whole Food B-12 for Metabolism and Energy, Raspberry, 2oz Liquid
product_meta.description:
MYKIND ORGANICS B-12. . .ORGANIC ENERGY! THE BIGGEST INNOVATION IN VITAMINS IN OVER A DECADE
Methylcobalamin: Vitamin B-12 (cobalamin) is a water soluble B vitamin that is essential for energy, metabolism, formation of healthy blood cells and DNA synthesis. Methylcobalamin is the active, natural form of B-12 (equivalent to the B-12 in your body).

Certified USDA Organic & Non-GMO Project Verified THE FIRST OF ITS KIND
Garden of Life introduces the FIRST NON-GMO PROJECT VERIFIED whole food methylcobalamin in a convenient, delicious organic raspberry spray. - Certified Vegan, Gluten Free and NO synthetic binders or fillers - Delicious, Mouth-watering ORGANIC Raspberry Spray - Promotes Concentration & Energy - Supports Metabolism & Heart Health - 500mcg of B-12 (Methylcobalamin)

WHO NEEDS B-12?
Vegans and Vegetarians - B-12 is found primarily in meat and dairy. Older Adults - 30% of those over 50 have increased unfriendly intestinal bacteria, preventing absorption of B-12. Pregnant Women - nutrients travel from mom to baby causing increased demand on mom. Any deficiency can affect both mom and baby.

MYKIND ORGANICS OVERVIEW
mykind Organics from Garden of Life offers a full range of Certified USDA Organic, Non-GMO Project Verified supplements made only from real food-over 30 fruits, vegetables and herbs. Absolutely free of synthetic binders and fillers, meaningful amounts of vitamins and minerals are carefully combined to benefit specific dietary needs. All of this goodness is wrapped up using Garden of Life's patent-pending Clean Tablet Technology - an entirely new way to make vitamins using only Certified USDA Organic, Non-GMO Project Verified foods. None of our Clean Tablet Technology ingredients come from soy or corn. myKind Organics - the first of its kind.




MYKIND ORGANICS B-12 AT A GLANCE
 * Certified Vegan, Gluten Free and No Synthetic Binders or Fillers
 * Delicious, Mouth-watering Organic Raspberry Spray
 * Promotes Concentration & Energy
 * Supports Metabolism & Heart Health
 * 500mcg of B-12 (Methylcobalamin)
feature_bullets: ENERGY SUPPLEMENT: One spray daily delivers 500 Microgram (8333percentage DV) vegan vitamin b12 as methylcobalamin to support energy, metabolism, and heart health

VITAMIN B 12: Essential to protect the body against anemia and support a healthy central nervous system, b12 vitamin helps maintain healthy nerve cells and red blood cells and is also needed to make DNA, the genetic material in all cells
CONCENTRATION SUPPLEMENT: This whole food b 12 concentration spray are made from real, nutritious foods
LIQUID VITAMIN: Our organic liquid vitamin b 12 comes in delicious, mouth watering raspberry spray
ORGANIC VITAMIN: Our real food b 12 vitamin is Certified USDA Organic, Non GMO Verified, Vegan Certified, Gluten Free Certified, and Kosher Made

specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
